Description.Title: UpdatePhase model
Description.Abstract: This strategy advances the phase and calculate the final leaf number

Input.description: minimum final leaf number
Input.name: minFinalNumber

Input.description: progression on a 0 to 1 scale of the vernalization
Input.name: vernaprog

Input.description: if Flag leaf ligule has already appeared
Input.name: isMomentRegistredZC_39

Input.description: if Last Primordium has Appeared
Input.name: hasLastPrimordiumAppeared_t1

Input.description: final leaf number
Input.name: finalLeafNumber_t1

Input.description: the name of the phase
Input.name: phase_t1

Input.description: Actual number of phytomers
Input.name: leafNumber_t1

Input.description: cumul thermal times at currentdate
Input.name: cumulTT

Input.description: cumul TT from FlagLeafLiguleJustVisible to current date
Input.name: cumulTTFromZC_39

Input.description: Green Area Index of the day
Input.name: gAI

Input.description: cumulTT used for the grain developpment
Input.name: grainCumulTT

Input.description: day length
Input.name: dayLength

Input.description: Phyllochron Varietal parameter
Input.name: fixPhyll

Input.description: cumul TT from EndGrainFilling to current date
Input.name: cumulTTFromZC_91

Input.description: true if the plant is vernalizable
Input.name: isVernalizable

Input.description: Thermal time from sowing to emergence
Input.name: dse

Input.description: Phyllochronic duration of the period between flag leaf ligule appearance and anthesis
Input.name: pFLLAnth

Input.description: Duration of the endosperm cell division phase
Input.name: dcd

Input.description: Grain filling duration (from anthesis to physiological maturity)
Input.name: dgf

Input.description: Grain maturation duration (from physiological maturity to harvest ripeness)
Input.name: degfm

Input.description: Saturating photoperiod above which final leaf number is not influenced by daylength
Input.name: maxDL

Input.description: Daylength response of leaf production
Input.name: sLDL

Input.description: true to ignore grain maturation
Input.name: ignoreGrainMaturation

Input.description: Number of phyllochron between heading and anthesiss
Input.name: pHEADANTH

Input.description: Switch to choose the type of phyllochron calculation to be used
Input.name: choosePhyllUse

Input.description: Phyllochron (Varietal parameter)
Input.name: p
